situation:
A beam having a span of 6 meters is supported at the left end by a spring which has a spring constant of 50
kN/m. E = 10000 MPa and I = 60x 10<sup>6</sup> mm<sup>4</sup>.

subquestions.question:
Which of the following nearly gives the
reaction at point A in Newtons?

Which of the following nearly gives the
moment at the fixed support in Newton-meter?

Which of the following nearly gives the
deflection of the spring in mm.
